labels.analysis: The MCP Server "gotoHuman" is primarily designed to facilitate human review of AI-generated content through a webhook-based workflow. It allows AI agents to request human input and approvals through predefined forms. The available tools suggest a workflow where forms are listed, their schemas are fetched, and reviews are requested with the appropriate form data. The core functionality revolves around bridging AI processes with human oversight, enabling a hybrid decision-making or content validation system.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Workflow Automation" is chosen because the server automates the process of requesting human reviews, which is a specific type of workflow. The secondary label "AI/ML Tools" is selected because the server is meant to enhance AI agents by allowing them to delegate tasks to humans. No custom label is needed as the predefined labels adequately cover the server's functionality.

server_info_crawled.name: gotoHuman
server_info_crawled.author: @gotohuman/gotohuman-mcp-server
server_info_crawled.overview: Request human reviews for AI-generated content seamlessly. Enhance your AI agents with the ability to seek human input and approvals through an intuitive webhook-based workflow.

tools.name: list-forms
tools.description: Deploy Server Claim Server @gotohuman/gotohuman-mcp-server Try in Playground

tools.name: get-form-schema
tools.description: list-forms List all available review forms. NOTE: You need to fetch the schema for the form fields first using the get-form-schema tool.

tools.name: request-human-review-with-form
tools.description: Request a human review with a form. NOTE: If you don't have a form ID yet, list all available forms using the list-forms tool first. To know what to pass for fieldData, you need to fetch the schema for the form fields using the get-form-schema tool.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@gotohuman/gotohuman-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
